articles.title: Credentials of Indian Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Indian Ambassador Accepted
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Pratap Singh, Indian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
					 Present on the occasion were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Kil Yon and staff members of the Indian embassy.

articles.title: Cooperation between DPRK-Russian Conservatories
articles.content:
Cooperation between DPRK-Russian Conservatories
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- An agreement on exchange and cooperation in education and culture was signed between Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory of the DPRK and Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory of Russia in Pyongyang on Monday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Rector Ri Il Nam and other officials of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory and from the Russian side were members of the delegation of Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory headed by President Alexandr Sokolov.

articles.title: 12th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
12th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held 
						
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The 12th Kimilsungia Festival will be held at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in Pyongyang from mid-April of Juche 99 (2010) on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. 
					 Exhibitors will include armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people, the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other overseas Koreans' organizations and foreign friends.
					
					 There will be provincial exhibitions of the immortal flower and people in local areas will visit the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Hothouses during the festival.

articles.title: Rason Taehung Trading Company
articles.content:
Rason Taehung Trading Company
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Rason Taehung Trading Company on the east coast of Korea has gained great achievements in the efforts for implementing the tasks set forth by this year's joint editorial issued by leading newspapers of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The company is furnished with pumps for filtering and sterilizing seawater with ultraviolet rays, air-cooling drier capable of keeping goods fresh and disinfected, equipment of making pieces of ice with sterilized seawater, etc.
					
					 Aquatic products from a fish culture ground are classified, cleaned and examined in the aquiculture tanks equipped with a thermostat and exhauster.
					
					 A seafood processing shop has crab, octopus and cuttlefish processing machines, vacuum packers, steam boilers and disinfecting process.
					
					 Various species of shellfish, sea cucumber, sea urchin and other high-grade marine products are raised in the fish culture ground covering several hundred hectares.
					
					 The products of the company are enjoying popularity among purchasers for their fresh and natural taste.
					
					 The company also produces nutritive juice made of songi mushroom or Tricholoma matsutake, tea, carbonic syrup, sweet jelly, vinegar, soy sauce and other foodstuffs.

articles.title: DPRK-targeted War Maneuvers Assailed
articles.content:
DPRK-targeted War Maneuvers Assailed
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises started by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers on March 8 are at their height, bringing to light their provocative nature as maneuvers for a war of aggression aimed at mounting a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK, nuclear war exercises.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 This reckless saber-rattling is a product of the hostile policy of the warmongers at home and abroad toward the DPRK, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said war maneuvers are going on at a time when the south Korean puppet authorities are letting loose a spate of belligerent outbursts such as "contingency" and "preemptive strike," while perpetrating ceaselessly military provocations against the DPRK in the waters of the West Sea. This cannot be construed otherwise than an extremely disturbing development. 
					
					 The on-going joint war exercises are a test nuclear war against the DPRK little different from the former Team Spirit joint military exercises as they are under way under the changed codename.
					
					 The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are targeted against the DPRK and the bellicose forces at home and abroad may ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK any time.
					
					 Brass hats of the militaries of the U.S. and south Korea did not conceal the fact that a landing operation against the coastal areas of the DPRK would be a climax of the joint military exercises. This provides a clear proof that the on-going war exercises are offensive ones for invading the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 The DPRK loves peace and does not want a war but will never allow the warmongers to invade it. It will mete out a merciless judgment to the aggressors.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean ruling quarters would be well advised to stop acting rashly, pondering over the catastrophic impact their frantic moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK will have on the inter-Korean relations, peace on the Korean Peninsula and the security of the nation.

articles.title: DPRK Will Show No Mercy to Aggressors
articles.content:
DPRK Will Show No Mercy to Aggressors
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and people of the DPRK, who value the dignity and sovereignty of the nation dearer than their own lives, will clearly teach what miserable end the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces will meet if they dare provoke the second Korean war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday serves this warning in a signed commentary.
					
					 The ongoing large-scale war exercises of the U.S. and south Korea are a reckless action of chilling the DPRK's efforts for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and premeditated saber-ratting to escalate the military confrontation and tension in the peninsula and drive the situation to a catastrophic phase of war, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the strategic target and wild ambition of the U.S. imperialists to contain the DPRK by mobilizing all means including military threat, sanctions and ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 The DPRK cannot trust the U.S. as it is playing a double-dealing game, with a dagger hidden under its belt.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand and principle of the DPRK to respond to good faith in kind and react to strength in kind. 
					
					 The south Korean warlike forces should refrain from doing such foul things as acting a war servant of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The DPRK's army of Songun will show neither mercy nor goodwill to the aggressors.

articles.title: Mental Power Based on Single-Minded Unity Called for
articles.content:
Mental Power Based on Single-Minded Unity Called for
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The leader of the DPRK trusts its people and they devote themselves to their work, remaining loyal to him. The mental power based on this single-minded unity means the most vivid manifestation of the mental power by Kim Il Sung's nation and represents a main engine in the history of the drive for a great surge in the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Last year witnessed ceaseless world-startling events and eye-opening miracles thanks to the high-pitched drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge. This was the brilliant fruition of the indomitable mental power displayed by all the service personnel and the people in making endeavors, single-mindedly united around their leader.
					
					 It is the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to ensure that the victory won in the drive for a great surge is followed by even greater one and glorify this significant year as a year of dramatic changes to be specially recorded in the history of building a thriving nation by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					The above-mentioned mental power provides a sure guarantee for successfully materializing General Secretary Kim Jong Il's idea of effecting a great surge and his far-reaching plans.
					
					 The reality in which ceaseless miracles and signal successes are now reported from all sectors of economic construction clearly testifies to the inexhaustible mental power based on the single-minded unity of the Korean people who share idea and will with Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The above-said mental power serves as a main source of the strength for maximizing the tempo of advance in the on-going general offensive this year.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to make persevering efforts, racing against the time, learning from the spirit displayed by Kim Jong Il in making a forced march.
					
					 The mental power based on the single-minded unity serves as a powerful weapon for fully demonstrating the invincibility of Korean style socialism in the on-going advance for effecting a great surge.
					
					 Unshakable is the faith of the service personnel and people in the DPRK to keep to the road of socialism no matter how conditions and environment may change in their revolutionary struggle and no matter how many difficulties may lie before them.
					
					 The cause of building a thriving nation is confidently advancing straight along the road of victory as there are the outstanding and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il and the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people around the headquarters of the revolution.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Obliterate National Education Blasted
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Obliterate National Education Blasted 
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Strong actions of Koreans in different parts of Japan are now going on in protest against the Japanese authorities' moves to exclude Korean schools in Japan from tuition-free program for the senior high schools in a bid to obliterate their national education. 
					 The Hyogo Prefectural Committee for Measures for National Education and Hyogo Korean School co-sponsored an emergency rally of Koreans in Hyogo Prefecture on March 6 in protest against the proposal to exclude Korean schools from the tuition-free program for the senior high schools.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said at the rally that it is preposterous and unpardonable for the Japanese authorities to contemplate excluding Korean schools from the above-said tuition-free program, calling on all Koreans from all walks of life to pool all efforts to protest against the proposal. 
					
					 A letter of request demanding the withdrawal of the policy of discrimination against Korean schools in Japan was adopted at the rally.
					
					 The managing director of Hiroshima Korean School, the principal of  Hiroshima Korean Primary Senior High School and other Koreans at a press conference held at the Hiroshima City Office on March 5 denounced Japan's harsh suppression of Koreans in Japan and its national discrimination against them.
					
					 Then the teachers and students of Hiroshima Korean Primary Senior High School and their parents conducted street information service and a signature campaign at Hiroshima Railway Station in protest against the Japanese authorities' unreasonable attitude. 
					
					 An emergency rally of Koreans in Hiroshima Prefecture took place on March 8 to call for assistance to the Korean schools.

articles.title: Nepalese, Austrian and Indonesian Blast Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Nepalese, Austrian and Indonesian Blast Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Nepal released a joint statement on Mar. 10 in denunciation of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the bellicose forces of south Korea.
					 They include the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee, the National Anti-Imperialist Forum, the Study Forum for Self-Reliance, the Institute for the Juche Studies, the Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, the Peace Action Committee, the National Press Club, the Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea and the Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea.
					
					 The United States and the south Korean authorities are staging the provocative exercises for aggression threatening peace not only on the Korean Peninsula but also in the rest of the Asian region despite repeated warnings of the DPRK and protest and denunciation by the international community, the statement said, and added: The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army ordered all the armed forces of the DPRK to get themselves fully ready to go into action. This order is quite a just measure to protect the country's sovereignty and dignity and socialism.
					
					The statement expressed full support for the unique Songun policy pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It strongly urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the provocative war exercises for aggression and the U.S. to withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and the durable peace of Asia. 
					
					 The federal leadership of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation sent letters to the U.S. embassy and the puppet south Korean embassy in Vienna in protest against Key Resolve and Foal Eagle on Mar. 9. 
					
					 Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, issued a statement denouncing the said exercises on the same day.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- One day in March Juche 49 (1960), President Kim Il Sung convened a conference of agricultural scientists and technicians and underscored the need to do two-crop farming a year in order to sharply increase overall agricultural production.
					 After the conference, all the cooperative farms throughout the country began to raise two crops a year but faced some difficulties.
					
					 So the President convened a conference again.
					
					 He told the conference that per-hectare grain yield could be increased through the development of chemical industry and mass-production of fertilizers but that was not enough for a solution to the food shortage. He then said two-crop farming was necessary to this end.
					
					 He also said there was a way for solving the water problem arising in two-crop farming and that he tested the water-sprinkling system in recent years to find its good effect so that he was confident the system was proper to two-crop farming.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador indio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador indio
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ATCC) -- Pratap Singh presento este lunes en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de la India en Corea. 
					Estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller coreano Pak Kil Yon y los miembros de la sede diplomatica.

articles.title: Acuerdo entre conservatorios de Corea y Rusia
articles.content:
Acuerdo entre conservatorios de Corea y Rusia
						
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ATCC) -- Quedo rubricado este lunes en esta capital el acuerdo sobre el intercambio y cooperacion en las esferas educacional y cultural entre el Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Conservatorio Estatal Chaikovski de Moscu de la Federacion Rusa.
					  En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el rector Ri Il Nam y otros funcionarios del primer conservatorio y por la rusa, los miembros de la delegacion del segundo plantel docente encabezada por el rector Alexandr Sokolov.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicios belicos EE.UU-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicios belicos EE.UU-Sur de Corea 
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos y los belicistas titeres del Sur de Corea dieron inicio a partir del pasado dia 8 los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho".
					  Ahora estos simulacros entran en etapa crucial revelando su caracter provocativo de ejercicios de guerra nuclear preventiva para asestar golpe sorpresivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					  El diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este lunes califica tales ejercicios imprudentes de productos de la politica hostil a la RPDC de los belicistas internos y externos y continua:
					
					  Los "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" se desarrollan mientras que los titeres surcoreanos no dejan de cometer provocaciones militares contra la RPDC en el Mar Oeste hablando tanto de la "situacion bruscamente cambiada" y el "ataque preventivo". 
					
					  Por lo tanto devienen una guerra de prueba nuclear contra la RPDC al igual que el anterior simulacro "Team Spirit".
					
					El blanco de los presentes ejercicios es la RPDC. Y es la cuestion del tiempo la provocacion de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC por las fuerzas belicistas internas y externas.
					
					  EE.UU. y la capa militar del Sur de Corea dijeron abiertamente que el climax de tales ejercicios sera la operacion de desembarco al litoral de la RPDC, lo cual sirve de clara prueba de que esos simulacros devienen los ejercicios de ofensiva para atacar a la RPDC. 
					
					  Amamos la paz y no queremos la guerra, pero, nunca perdonaremos a los belicistas que nos echen tentaculos de agresion y los castigaremos despiadadamente. 
					
					  EE.UU. y los gobernantes del Sur de Corea deben actuar con prudencia reflexionandose de la influencia irreparable que ejerceran sus freneticas maniobras agresivas anti-RPDC a las relaciones Norte-Sur, a la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y a la seguridad de la nacion.

articles.title: Fuerzas armadas de Corea son implacables, advierte Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Fuerzas armadas de Corea son implacables, advierte Rodong Sinmun 
						
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ATCC) -- Si los belicistas de Estados Unidos y del Sur de Corea se atreven a provocar al fin la segunda guerra coreana, el ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que aprecian mas que la vida la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion, demostraran claramente cuan amargo es el fin de los provocadores.
					Asi advierte el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 15 y continua:
					
					El desarrollo forzoso de los simulacros de gran envergadura por EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea es un acto imprudente que desafia a los esfuerzos de la RPDC por realizar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y deviene el juego premeditado tendente a agudizar la confrontacion militar y la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y llevar la situacion a la catastrofica fase de guerra.
					
					Valerse de todos los medios como la amenaza militar, la sancion y la penetracion ideologica y cultural para aplastar a la RPDC, es la meta estrategica y la ambicion de los imperialistas yanquis.
					
					No podemos confiar en EE.UU. que actua con dos caras ocultando el punal en el pecho.
					
					Responder con buena voluntad a la buena voluntad y con las fuerzas a las fuerzas es la posicion y principio invariables de la RPDC.
					
					Las fuerzas belicosas del Sur de Corea deben dejar de actuar como sirvientes de la guerra de los yanquis.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas del Songun no saben la piedad ni buena fe, sino son implacables.
